successes.title: Earin - The Worlds Smallest Wireless Earbuds
successes.description: Wireless earbuds filled with sound, yet so small they are almost invisible!

Pledges.description: THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT. Thanks for helping us take earin forward! You'll also receive a £20 discount from earins’s online store and a backer-only update on the progress of the earin.

SUPER EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: Get a pair of worlds smallest in-ear wireless headphones in our unique charging capsule. This great offer is for our earliest backers — get it before it runs out. Suggested retail price is £159.

MISSED THE SUPER EARLY BIRD SPECIAL: Get nearly the same price as the SUPER EARLY BIRD SPECIAL and with the same delivery date. You’ll receive a set of earin wireless headphones and the unique charging capsule.
GET THE EARIN: a set of the worlds smallest in-ear wireless headphones and the unique charging capsule, still a great offer at £40 lower than the suggested retail price of £159.
GET THE EARIN, A MONTH LATER: a set of the worlds smallest in-ear wireless headphones and the unique charging capsule, still a great offer at £40 lower than the suggested retail price of £159.
